name: Mutated Plant Invasion
description:
Hi,

This will be my first proper game i uploaded somewhere, i know its unrefind and rough on the edges. And please dont rate the game on how good /bad the art is. Im just a junior programmer and i am no where near a good enough Artist for this type of caliber. I do believe that this game has unique ideas that not a lot of games have or even any at all. I have created all assets you see but I did get lots of refences from the Internet so do not be suprised if they look similar. I have used medibang paint pro to create all assets.

I do hope you all enjoy your time playing my game.
